room_title: Escape room "Tesla's Mystery" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
review: We had a group of 4, it was a first for all of us and We had a blast! The Tesla room was challenging and exciting. Definitely made us work well together. Can't wait to come and do the circus room!

room_title: Escape room "Tesla's Mystery" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
review: We did Teslaâ€™s room and it was a blast . We had a group of 6, with the youngest being 15. The room is very challenging but a lot of fun ! Everything is very well done with a lot of detail! Would highly recommend!!

room_title: Escape room "Tesla's Mystery" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
review: Did the Tesla Room; group of 5 (ages 18 to 50 something). Puzzles were very challenging but not completely impossible and lots of fun! We had an absolute blast! We did utilize 2 of our clues and the game master, towards the end, assisted by telling us to review the one puzzle (without giving anything away). We did complete with a few minutes to spare! Looking forward to returning in the future to complete the Circus room! Props and decor absolutely beautiful! Well worth the cost for a evening of fun!
